title: The agency has a governance structure, responsibilities and authorities in place for capital program prioritisation

description.name: Intent
description.text: To identify the extent to which the agency has established and documented roles, responsibilities and authorities for the execution of the capital program prioritisation process. The governance arrangements should include documented review and approval processes, expenditure committee arrangements/charters, appropriate audit and improvement arrangements, evidence of a single point of accountability for the capital program (Executive Manager level), and processes to ensure that the appropriate level of skills and resources are available at each level of capital project/program development to be able to prepare and review inputs and prioritisation activities.
